title: Convert app to Progressive Web App (PWA)

requirements.text: Add PWA manifest file (frontend/public/manifest.json) with app name, icons, theme colors, display mode 'standalone', and start URL
acceptanceCriteria: Manifest includes name, short_name, description, icons array, theme_color, background_color, display: 'standalone', and start_url fields
Manifest is linked in index.html via <link rel="manifest">
App can be installed on iOS Safari via 'Add to Home Screen'

requirements.text: Create service worker (frontend/public/sw.js) to enable offline functionality and caching of static assets
acceptanceCriteria: Service worker file exists at frontend/public/sw.js
Service worker caches shell assets (HTML, CSS, JS) on install
Service worker serves cached content when offline
Service worker is registered in main.tsx or index.html

requirements.text: Generate PWA icon set with multiple sizes (192x192, 512x512) for manifest icons array
acceptanceCriteria: Icon files exist in frontend/public/icons directory
Icons include 192x192 and 512x512 PNG sizes minimum
Icons are referenced in manifest.json icons array with correct sizes and types
Icons display correctly when app is installed on home screen

requirements.text: Add iOS-specific meta tags to index.html for optimal PWA experience (apple-mobile-web-app-capable, apple-mobile-web-app-status-bar-style, apple-mobile-web-app-title, apple-touch-icon)
acceptanceCriteria: index.html includes apple-touch-icon link tags for iOS icons
App runs in standalone mode on iOS after installation

constraints: Do not modify backend/main.mo or backend/migration.mo
Do not edit immutable frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Service worker must not interfere with Internet Identity authentication flow
Offline functionality should gracefully handle authenticated vs guest states
nonGoals: Native iOS app wrapper using Capacitor or Cordova
Advanced offline sync strategies for authenticated data

required: NFL combine app icon with football theme for PWA installation (pwa-icon-192.dim_192x192.png)
NFL combine app icon with football theme for PWA installation (pwa-icon-512.dim_512x512.png)
Apple touch icon with football theme for iOS home screen (apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png)
